AddImageIncidentSamplesOptions.description: The request to add incidentSamples to a incident.

AddImageIncidentSamplesResult.description: The response of adding incidentSamples to the incident.

incidentSamples.description: Array of incidentSamples have been added.

AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsOptions.description: The request to add blocklistItems to a text blocklist.

AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsResult.description: The response of adding blocklistItems to the text blocklist.

blocklistItems.description: Array of blocklistItems have been added.

AddTextIncidentSamplesResult.description: The response of adding incidentSamples to the incident.

incidentSamples.description: Array of incidentSamples have been added.

image.description: The image needs to be analyzed.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of image analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

AnalyzeImageOutputType.description: The type of image analysis output.

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

AnalyzeImageWithTextOptions.description: The analysis request of the image with text.

image.description: The image needs to be analyzed.

text.description: The text attached to the image. We support at most 1k characters (unicode code points) in one text request.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

enableOcr.description: When set to true, our service will perform OCR and concatenate the recognized text with input text before analyzing. We will recognize at most 256 characters (unicode code points) from input image. The others will be truncated.

AnalyzeImageWithTextResult.description: The analysis response of the image with text.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed if it attempt to jailbreak. We support a maximum of 1k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.
The text needs to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 10k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

haltOnBlocklistHit.description: When set to true, further analyses of harmful content will not be performed in cases where blocklists are hit. When set to false, all analyses of harmful content will be performed, whether or not blocklists are hit.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of text analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

AnalyzeTextOutputType.description: The type of text analysis output.

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

values.name: EightSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in eight levels, the value could be 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 1k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

citation.description: Chunks in the original text detected as harmful content. Analysis result and scores are caused by these.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 10k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

category.description: The category will be analyzed, you can set your customized category or one of built-in categories in 'Hate','Selfharm', 'Sexual' and 'Violence'.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

blobPrefixLocation.description: The URL to a blob prefix which represents a directory containing all the images to be analyzed in this batch task.

delimiter.description: The delimiter character you desire to use in the location URL, typically '/'.

extensions.description: An array of strings indicating file extensions of desired images within the logical folder.

lastModified.description: The last modified time (in RFC1123 format) of blobs. Only images that were modified before this time will be analyzed.

images.description: The blob parameters of images to be analyzed.

analysisResults.description: The blob parameters of result files.

resultsStorageMode.description: The storage mode for the batch task results, either 'CollectiveResultFile' or 'IndividualResultFiles'.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of image analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be 'FourSeverityLevels'.

blobPrefixLocation.description: The URL to a blob prefix which represents a directory. The analysis result file(s) will be written to this directory.

delimiter.description: The delimiter character you desire to use in the location URL, typically '/'.

BatchResultsStorageMode.description: The type of batch results storage mode.

values.name: CollectiveResultFile
values.description: Merge each result into one file.

values.name: IndividualResultFiles
values.description: Store each result in a single file.

BatchTaskStatus.description: The type of batch analysis task status.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The task has not started yet.

domain.description:
The domain of the text for analysis.
This field is optional, with a default value of Generic.

task.description:
The task type for the text analysis.
This field is optional, with a default value of Summarization.

query.description:
The user's question input in a QnA scenario.
This field is optional, but if the task type is set to QnA, it becomes required.

groundingSources.description: The source information used as a grounding reference.

reasoning.description:
A value indicating if the output includes an explanation for the identified ungroundedness.
This field is optional, with a default value of false.

gptResource.description:
Connection details for the GPT resource. 
This field will be used only when the 'reasoning' field is set to true; otherwise, it will be ignored.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score of the model in the analysis results.

ungroundedDetails.description: The detailed information about a text identified as ungrounded.

GptResource.description: Connection details for the GPT resource.

id.description: The id of image batch analysis task.

status.description: The status of the batch image analysis task.

error.description: Return error detail when the task failed.

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when batch image analysis task was created.

progressPercentage.description: The progress of the batch image analysis task, represented as a percentage (0-100).

analysisResults.description: The blob parameters of result files.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6.

ImageData.description: The image can be either base64 encoded bytes or a blob URL. You can choose only one of these options. If both are provided, the request will be refused. The maximum image size is 2048 x 2048 pixels and should not exceed 4 MB, while the minimum image size is 50 x 50 pixels.

content.description: The Base64 encoding of the image.

blobUrl.description: The blob url of the image.

ImageDataResult.description: The image result is base64 encoded bytes

content.description: The Base64 encoding of the image.

ImageIncidentSampleResult.description: Sample Result in an Image Incident.

severity.description: The higher the severity of input content, the larger this value is. The values could be: 0,2,4,6.

IncidentMatch.description: The result of text incident match.

incidentName.description: The name of the matched incident.

incidentNames.description: The accept decision made by service.

haltOnIncidentHit.description: When set to true, further analyses of harmful content will not be performed in cases where incidents are hit. When set to false, all analyses of harmful content will be performed, whether or not incidents are hit.

value.description: The ImageBatchTaskDetail items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The ImageIncident items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The TextIncident items on this page

value.description: The TextIncidentSample items on this page

ProtectedMaterialAnalysisResult.description: The text protected material analysis response.

RemoveImageIncidentSamplesOptions.description: The request to remove incidentSamples from a incident.

RemoveTextBlocklistItemsOptions.description: The request to remove blocklistItems from a text blocklist.

RemoveTextIncidentSamplesOptions.description: The request to remove incidentSamples from a incident.

blocklistItemId.description: The service will generate a BlocklistItemId, which will be a UUID.

blocklistName.description: The name of the matched blocklist.

blocklistItemId.description: The ID of the matched item.

blocklistItemText.description: The content of the matched item.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels or EightSeverity Levels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6 or 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7.

UngroundedDetails.description: The detailed information about a text identified as ungrounded.

reason.description:
The explanation for identifying the text as ungrounded. 
Only when the 'reasoning' field in the input is set to true 'reason' field will be returned.
